5/5 - Again, don't feel missed out. You can always make up for this with a few index trades with some leverage (if you are a good enough trader). Not many would have made too much money in the recent rally. Chill!!! #Nifty #TataMotors #HDFCBank #Reliance #jiofinancial

4/5 -Overall, comfortable with the holdings now. Won't be adding for at least a few more months. - This (degree) of out-performance in the broader market was the largest in the last 20 years (Nilesh Shah). Wasn't around then. New learning. #Nifty #TataMotors #HDFCBank #Reliance

3/5 - It doesn't matter how many scrips you have in your #portfolio. Had almost 30 scrips (vs 10 now) once. It's just the allocation to non-core holdings was always <<< 30%. They were the big gainers mostly (this time around). #Nifty #TataMotors #HDFCBank #Reliance #jiofinancial

2/5 - Also, my #portfolio was DOWN 12% at one point. Hence, it felt prudent to book profits in the mid & small-cap scrips.  - Overall, holdings UP 14% (15% A-TH). Good with 3 months still left & not  in over-bought territory. #Nifty #TataMotors #HDFCBank #Reliance #jiofinancial

1/5 Takeaways from the last 8-9 months:  - Target multi-baggers during market crashes (or) if your #portfolio is up 50-100% at least. My investments started during the prev. market highs around 18,500 (hence the exits).  #Nifty #TataMotors #HDFCBank #Reliance #jiofinancial
